Terms and Conditions

Data and Content Usage

    Data Accuracy: While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, "Eastern & South Eastern Railfans' Corner"
    makes no warranties or representations regarding the completeness, accuracy, or reliability of the data on this site.
    Non-Commercial Use: The information and images on this site are for personal and educational use only.
    Any commercial use is strictly prohibited without prior written consent from "Eastern & South Eastern Railfans' Corner".

Image Submissions and Copyright

    Ownership: All images submitted to "Eastern & South Eastern Railfans' Corner" remain the property of their respective owners.
    License to Use: By submitting images, you grant "Eastern & South Eastern Railfans' Corner" a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, display, and distribute the images on the website.
    Attribution: When submitting images, please provide proper attribution. "Eastern & South Eastern Railfans' Corner" will credit the photographers whenever possible.
    Copyright Compliance: If you believe any content on this website infringes upon your copyright, please contact us with the details, and we will take appropriate action.

User Conduct

    No Login Required: Users can access the information and images without the need to create an account or log in.
    Respectful Interaction: Users are expected to interact respectfully and refrain from any activities that may disrupt the website or its content.

Administration and Moderation

    Admin Rights: The website is maintained by a group of admins who have the right to modify, delete, or add content as they see fit.
    User Submissions: Admins may review and approve user-submitted images and content to ensure compliance with these terms.

Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability

    No Warranty: "Eastern & South Eastern Railfans' Corner" is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied.
    Limitation of Liability: "Eastern & South Eastern Railfans' Corner" will not be liable for any damages arising from the use of this website.

Governing Law

These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of The Government of West Bengal, The Government of India and The Constitution of India.

Changes to Terms

"Eastern & South Eastern Railfans' Corner" reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time.
Changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
